search_input: matador, bullfighting, bullfighter, flamenco, castanets, bolero, gyrating, choreography, outfit, salsa, pose, decor, adorned, bacchanal, adore, collaborator, liaison, vase, decorate, menorah, strut, shimmy, belladonna, catwalk, carousel, knickknack, mambo, dance, banner, decorating
suggested_query: The matador's outfit was adorned with intricate lace and sequins, shimmering under the bright lights of the arena as he strutted confidently onto the catwalk. His partner, a sultry flamenco dancer, swayed seductively to the rhythm of the salsa music, her castanets clinking in perfect syncopation with the beat. As the crowd roared with anticipation, the matador raised his arms, and the dancer responded with a dramatic shimmy, her bolero skirt swirling around her like a whirlwind.
